name: Timber!
description:
Timber!

is a 2D point-and-click storydriven game that takes you on an emotional journey.

Explore a mix of feelings

from the heart-wrenching struggles of dementia to the unraveling of a tragic story,
all within the enchanting embrace of a whimsical adventure.

Are you ready to play a game

where your future is wasted, but your past has just begun?

Find, click and combine!


Explore and find useful items to help you on your way. Sometimes just a simple, boring everyday ~stick~ won't help you, but what if you combine it with fire ant eggs and ketchup? Hmm, makes you wonder...

Talk, listen and learn?


Sometimes you just have to listen. I know, you like to talk more, but I promise you,
it will help you in the end...
- Or you just wasted your whole day listening a story about a hedgehog with golden sandals and hearing a weirdly detailed description of the weird rash your neighbor has.
